headline: NGP Energy considers sale of Camino Natural Resources for $2bn
summary: Camino, a private producer in Oklahoma's Anadarko Basin, operates assets across approximately 135,000 net acres.

headline: Goldman Sachs resumes coverage on Expand Energy with buy, cuts Occidental to sell
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs reinstated coverage on Expand Energy Corp (NASDAQ:EXE) with a "Buy" rating and a $121 price target, citing operational efficiency and strategic exposure to key natural gas basins following its merger with Chesapeake Energy (NYSE:CHK) and Southwestern Energy (NYSE:SWN).
